TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Project extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Please use Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project from the Microsoft.Build assembly instead.")

summary.span: 表示可以使用 MSBuild 生成的项目。

span.span: Represents a project that can be built using MSBuild.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]项目。A represents an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project. 它是项、属性和目标的容器。It is a container for items, properties and targets. 它可以从内存中 XML 或 XML 文件加载项目内容, 并且可以保存到 XML 文件中, 同时保留大多数空白和所有 XML 注释。It can load project content from in-memory XML or from an XML file, and can save to an XML file, preserving most white space and all XML comments. 每个都必须与关联以访问共享信息。Every must be associated with an to access shared information. 在生成过程中, 对象跟踪当前正在生成的项目。During a build, the object keeps track of which projects are currently building.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象, 并使用、 和类列出项目中的所有项和属性。The following example creates a object and uses the , , and classes to list all the items and properties in the project. summary.span: 获取或设置 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 项目中 [Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) 元素的 DefaultTargets 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the DefaultTargets attribute of the [Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) element in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.

value.span: 分号 (;)DefaultTargets特性中指定的目标的分隔列表。

span.span: A semi-colon (;) delimited list of the targets specified in the DefaultTargets attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultToolsVersion : string with get, set

summary.span: 设置或获取在项目文件中的 Project 元素上找到的 ToolsVersion XML 特性。

span.span: Sets or gets the ToolsVersion XML attribute found on the Project element in the project file.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示工具的版本。

span.span: A string representing the Tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 [项目元素](/visualstudio/msbuild/project-element-msbuild)中不存在该属性, 则获取值将返回父级的默认工具版本。If the attribute is not present on the [Project element](/visualstudio/msbuild/project-element-msbuild), getting the value returns the default Tools version of the parent . 如果其值在构造实例过程中被重写, 则 该值可以与在生成过程中使用的工具版本不同,也可以使用属性设置为特定值。The value can differ from the Tools version used during a build if its value is overridden during construction of the instance or it is set to a specific value with the property. 如果工具版本已被重写, 则设置 值无法更改工具版本,但可以使用属性更改工具版本。Setting the value cannot change the Tools version if it has been overridden, but you can change the Tools version using the property. 有关工具版本的详细信息, 请参阅[MSBuild 工具集 (ToolsVersion)](/visualstudio/msbuild/msbuild-toolset-toolsversion)。For more information about Tools versions, see [MSBuild ToolSet (ToolsVersion)](/visualstudio/msbuild/msbuild-toolset-toolsversion).

span.span: Gets the encoding for the project file.

value.span: 项目文件的 值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedItems As BuildItemGroup

summary.span: 获取在生成过程中计算的项的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the items evaluated during the build.

value.span: 包含在生成过程中计算的项的 。

span.span: A containing the items evaluated during the build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的包含通配符和属性展开后项目中的所有计算项。The returned contains all the evaluated items in the project after wildcard and property expansion. 此属性中的项表示在生成过程中使用的实际项。The items in this property represent the actual items used during the build process. 每次项目中的内容发生更改时, 都会生成此属性值。This property value is generated every time something in the project changes. 对此集合中的现有项所做的更改将在下一次保存项目时进行反映, 但添加或删除项不会影响项目。Changes to existing items in this collection will be reflected the next time the project is saved, but adding or deleting items will not impact the project.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedItemsIgnoringCondition As BuildItemGroup

summary.span: 获取项目中所有项的集合，甚至包括那些由于 [Condition](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9d7aa308-b667-48ed-b4c9-a61e49eb0a85) 特性计算结果为 而不在生成过程中使用的项。

span.span: Gets a collection of all items in a project, even those not used in the build process because a [Condition](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9d7aa308-b667-48ed-b4c9-a61e49eb0a85) attribute evaluated to .

value.span: 包含项目中所有项的 。

span.span: A containing all items in a project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的包含项目中的所有项, 并在执行通配符和属性扩展后, 包括`Condition`由于特性的计算结果为`false`而不在生成过程中使用的那些项。The returned contains all items in the project after wildcard and property expansion, including those that were not used during the build process due to `Condition` attributes evaluating to `false`. 仅当发生某些更改 (如要添加到项目的新[导入](/visualstudio/msbuild/import-element-msbuild)元素) 时, 才会生成此属性值。This property value is only generated when certain changes occur, such as a new [Import](/visualstudio/msbuild/import-element-msbuild) element being added to the project. 添加或删除此属性中的项不会影响项目。Adding or deleting items from this property does not impact the project.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EvaluatedProperties As BuildPropertyGroup

summary.span: 获取在生成过程中计算的属性的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the properties evaluated during the build.

value.span: 包含在生成过程中计算的属性的 。

span.span: A containing the properties evaluated during the build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在执行条件求值和属性扩展后, 返回的包含项目中的所有计算属性。The returned contains all the evaluated properties in the project after performing condition evaluation and property expansion. 此集合中的属性包括全局属性、环境变量、保留属性和导入的属性。The properties in this collection include global properties, environment variables, reserved properties, and imported properties. 对此集合中的现有属性所做的更改将在下一次保存项目时反映出来, 但添加或删除属性将不会影响项目。Changes to existing properties in this collection will be reflected the next time the project is saved, but adding or deleting properties will not impact the project. > [!NOTE] > 克隆可能会对性能产生负面影响。Cloning a can negatively impact performance. 仅当绝对必要时才使用此属性的副本。Only use a copy of this property when it is strictly necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ GlobalProperties { Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::BuildEngine::BuildPropertyGroup ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置项目的全局属性的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of the global properties for the project.

value.span: 包含项目的全局属性的 。

span.span: A containing the global properties for the project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 全局属性是通过命令行上的 **/property**开关设置的属性, 或在调用[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]之前由集成开发环境设置的属性。Global properties are properties set with the **/property** switch on the command line, or properties set by the integrated development environment before invoking [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[MSBuild 命令行参考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/edaa65ec-ab8a-42a1-84cb-d76d5b2f4584)。For more information, see [MSBuild Command-Line Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/edaa65ec-ab8a-42a1-84cb-d76d5b2f4584).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasToolsVersionAttribute As Boolean
public: property bool HasToolsVersionAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取项目文件是否具有 ToolsVersion XML 特性。

span.span: Gets whether the Project file has the ToolsVersion XML attribute.

value.span: 如果项目具有 ToolsVersion 特性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the project has the ToolsVersion attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ToolsVersion 属性的一个示例`Project ToolsVersion="3.5"`是。An example ToolsVersion attribute is `Project ToolsVersion="3.5"`. 此属性使项目可面向 .NET Framework 版本, 当前为2.0、3.0 和3.5。This attribute enables projects to target .NET Framework versions, currently 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5. 有关 ToolsVersion 的详细信息, 请参阅[生成特定版本的 .NET Framework](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8)。For more information about ToolsVersion, see [Building for Specific Versions of the .NET Framework](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性的值, 并根据需要对其进行转义, 以便将其视为文本值 (尽管它可能包含任何特殊字符)。Sets the value of a property and optionally escapes it so that it will be treated as a literal value despite any special characters it may contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从集成开发环境 (IDE) 中调用, 以在项目级别设置特定的属性。 is called from the integrated development environment (IDE) to set a particular property at the project level. 此方法在现有属性组中搜索具有此名称的属性。This method searches the existing property groups for a property with this name. 如果找到一个, 则更改其值。If one is found, it changes its value. 否则, 它会将新属性添加到该属性组, 或向项目添加新的属性组。Otherwise, it either adds a new property to that property group, or adds a new property group to the project. `condition`使用参数确定属性组的名称。 uses the `condition` parameter to determine the name of the property group place it in.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象指示上一次更改项目以至于需要将项目保存到文件的时间。

span.span: Gets a object indicating the time the project was last changed in a way that required it to be saved to a file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ToolsVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ ToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 设置或获取项目正在使用的工具集的当前版本。

span.span: Sets or gets the current version of the Toolset being used by the project.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示工具集的版本号。

span.span: A string representing the version number of the Toolset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果重写工具集版本, 则该值将成为有效的工具集版本。If the Toolset version is overridden, that value becomes the effective Toolset version. 如果项目元素上存在 ToolsVersion 属性, 则这是有效的工具集版本。If there is a ToolsVersion attribute on the Project element, then that is the effective Toolset version. 否则, 工具集版本与父引擎的默认工具集版本相同。Otherwise, the Toolset version is the same as the default Toolset version of the parent engine. 设置后, 将用提供的值替代项目的当前工具集版本。When set, overrides the current Toolset version of the project with the provided value. 有关工具集的更多信息，请参阅[标准和自定义工具集配置](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15a048c8-5ad3-448e-b6e9-e3c5d7147ed2)。For more information about Toolsets, see [Standard and Custom Toolset Configurations](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15a048c8-5ad3-448e-b6e9-e3c5d7147ed2). > [!NOTE] > 若要获取或设置元素的 ToolsVersion 属性, 请使用属性。To get or set the ToolsVersion attribute on the element, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象, 并使用方法将内容添加到项目。The following example creates a object and uses the method to add content to the project. 、和类用于添加、移除和更改项目中的项。 The , , and classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
